ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: ... When I tested it long ago, the only benefit to weaving Anthem with Warsong is the added strength bonus - the attack speed bonuses did not stack.  I ll test
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 20 Jul 1999, Mr. Beeba wrote:
>
> Is it just me, or has anyone else noticed that using a
> dirk/whip combo and twisting anthem and warsong kills a
> monster faster than using just the weapons and
> bellow/anthem combo?

When I tested it long ago, the only benefit to weaving Anthem
with Warsong is the added strength bonus - the attack speed
bonuses did not stack. I'll test it again tonight. This is
an issue long overdue for some more thorough testing
considering we don't get an upgrade all the way from L10
(Anthem) to L36 (Celerity).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
